mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.main_id AS "mainId",a.main_name AS "mainName", a.other_id AS "otherId",a.other_name AS "otherName", a.title AS "title", a.file AS "file", a.content AS "content",a.isdraft AS "isdraft"
LEFT JOIN sys_user b ON b.id = a.create_by LEFT JOIN sys_office c ON b.office_id = c.id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO oa_mail( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, main_id,main_name, other_id,other_name, title, file, content,isdraft ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{mainId},#{mainName}, #{otherId},#{otherName}, #{title}, #{file}, #{content},#{isdraft} )
mapper.update: UPDATE oa_mail SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, main_id = #{mainId},main_name = #{mainName}, other_id = #{otherId}, other_name = #{otherName}, title = #{title}, file = #{file}, content = #{content},isdraft=#{isdraft} WHERE id = #{id}
